reviews.review_msg: This professor has a certain right-wing point of view, which might be viewed as a counter balance to SFU's left-wing political science department, however, he is not open to other opinions or views for that matter.  Spit out what he likes or watch your grade fall.

Moens is a researcher and writer, not a teacher. However, he tries hard and makes up for his weakness in teaching by giving great advice on essays. He marks fairly and treats students with respect.  He does have strong opinions!
